script.name: plugin.patch.menu.pack
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.patch'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104264 $input = create input: id='pack.station', user input=Var/Station owned by Player, refobj=$a.tl, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input
else if $a.event == 'pack.station' if $a.data -> exists $menu.page.id = $page.id $menu.text.id = 0 $menu.extra = null
$station.code = $a.data -> get ware type code of object if is station type a mine: stationtype=$station.code $menu.text.id = 3 else if $station.code == Xenon Hub $menu.text.id = 4 else if $a.data -> is of class Factory if $a.data ->is factory upgrading $menu.text.id = 5 else if $a.data ->is factory upgrading queued $menu.text.id = 6 end end end
* check we have enough space $any.wares = [FALSE] if not $menu.text.id $total.volume = get volume of ware $station.code $tl.free = $a.tl -> get free volume of cargo bay
$aWares = $a.data -> get tradeable ware array from station $i = size of array $aWares while $i dec $i = $ware = $aWares[$i] do if $ware == Credits continue $amt = $a.data -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $amt $ware.vol = get volume of ware $ware $total.volume = $total.volume + ( $ware.vol * $amt ) $any.wares = [TRUE] end end
if $tl.free < $total.volume $menu.text.id = 7 end end
* we don currently support maines if not $menu.text.id $marines = $a.data -> get marines array if $marines if size of array $marines $menu.text.id = 8 end end end
* accept if not $menu.text.id if $any.wares if not $a.data -> is docking possible of $a.tl if not $a.tl -> get amount of ware Freight Drone in cargo bay $menu.text.id = 9 end end end end
if not $menu.text.id set global variable: name='menu.accept' value=$a.data $menu.page.id = $a.tl ->get pilot voice $menu.text.id = 10 $menu.extra = read text: page=$page.id id=10 else set global variable: name='menu.accept' value=[FALSE] end
gosub sub.DoMenu return $input end
else if $a.event == 'pack.comm.menu' if $a.data == 'close' $station = get global variable: name='menu.accept' if $station -> exists @ START $a.tl -> call script !ship.cmd.packstation.std : Station=$station end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Cancelled] if $a.data == 'pack.comm.menu' $station = get global variable: name='menu.accept' if $station -> exists @ START $a.tl -> call script !ship.cmd.packstation.std : Station=$station end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='menu.accept' value=null end
return null
sub.DoMenu: $menu = create custom menu array $name = $a.tl -> get pilot name $pilot.voice = $a.tl ->get pilot voice $pilot.face = $a.tl ->get pilot face set menu option: $menu, video display comm name=$name, face=$pilot.face, duration=0, mood=[Mood.Normal]
$read.text = read text: page=1906 id=302 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='close'
set menu line option: $menu, text colour=[MenuColour.Bold] START speak text: page=$menu.page.id id=$menu.text.id priority=60 $read.text = read text: page=$menu.page.id id=$menu.text.id $width = get menu width: widthtype=[MenuWidth.Standard] $width = $width - 40 $aText = split string: $read.text, to width: $width $size = size of array $aText $i = 0 while $i < $size $text = $aText[$i] $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Bold] text=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text inc $i = end
$height = $size + 3
if $menu.extra add info line section to menu: $menu $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-1 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Bold] text=$menu.extra add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $height = $height + 2 end
set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=$height lines set menu option: $menu, icon=15 set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=684 $text = $a.tl -> get ID code $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $a.tl, $text, null, null, null $input = create input: id='pack.comm.menu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$text callback=null endsub return null

line.text: get ware type code of object
is station type a mine: stationtype=
get free volume of cargo bay
get tradeable ware array from station
add custom menu item to array
create custom menu column string, position=
add custom menu info line to array
add info line section to menu:
create custom menu column string, position=
add custom menu info line to array
